name: Divine
description: Those who draw abilities from the gifts allowed to them by their deity, not enchantment. Their belief becomes their armor, their will the weapon that shields others and purifies corruption.

features.name: Channel Conviction
features.description: You can channel radiant energy through words or gestures. When you strike with a melee attack or cast a divine ability, add +1 radiant damage to the result.

features.name: Sanctified Will
features.description: You gain advantage on saving throws against fear and charm effects.

features.name: Light of Resolve
features.description: Once per short rest, as a Bonus Action, you and allies within 10 ft gain +1 Defense against all attacks until the start of your next turn.
